lead_paragraph: A sheriff in a county on the edge of western North Dakota's oil patch faces misdemeanor charges in the death of a county jail inmate after allegedly refusing to get him medical attention due to "dollars and cents," court records show.

headline.main: Sheriff Faces Misdemeanor After Dying Inmate Didn't Get Care
headline.print_headline: Sheriff Faces Misdemeanor After Dying Inmate Didn't Get Care

snippet: A sheriff in a county on the edge of western North Dakota's oil patch faces misdemeanor charges in the death of a county jail inmate after allegedly refusing to get him medical attention due to "dollars and cents," court records show....
